item.description:
Keeping a dream journal, setting dream intentions, asking dream questions, re-entering dreams in meditation, and doing reality checks to help induce lucid dreaming. These are some of the skills we can share.

What techniques do you use in your dreamwork? What techniques would you like to learn? What are your dream goals? Come network with your fellow dreamers, share your dream skills, and learn from others. We can all learn a great deal from each other. Boston Dreamers is a very dynamic and knowledgeable group of dreamers with a much experience navigating the dream realms. The depth and breadth of our knowledge is huge, as are the dream realms themselves. It always amazes me what expertise we have among our members and what wisdom we share with each other at our meetings.

"If the doors of perception were cleansed every thing would appear to man as it is, infinite." - William Blake

Payment is $10 and can be made online or in person. Anyone who cannot afford to pay is encouraged to attend anyway and should contact the group organizer Deerheart before attending.

Event will be from 7 pm until 9 pm. Space is limited to 15 people. RSVP requested. Please update your RSVP if you are unable to attend, to allow others to attend. Thank you.

For directions and other information about Cambridge Swedenborg Chapel, please visit http://www.swedenborg...
item.how_to_find_us: Side entrance by the parking lot, up stairs, through hallway, left into parlor.
item.name: Dream Skill Sharing
